name: Companies that reported business process innovation, by firm classification of sex and innovation R&D activity: 2017–19
description: Companies that reported business process innovation, by firm classification of sex and innovation R&D activity: 2017–19

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_innovation_r_d_activity_number_yes
variableMeasured.description: Innovation R D Activity Number Yes

variableMeasured.name: field_innovation_r_d_activity_number_no
variableMeasured.description: Innovation R D Activity Number No

variableMeasured.name: field_innovation_r_d_activity_percent_yes
variableMeasured.description: Innovation R D Activity Percent Yes

variableMeasured.name: field_innovation_r_d_activity_percent_no
variableMeasured.description: Innovation R D Activity Percent No

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Innovation R&D activity is based on unedited company responses to innovation questions, not R&D expenditures. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, 2020 Annual Business Survey: Data Year 2019.
